param.name: smt
param.doc: Enable usage of hyperthreaded cores if available on current architecture.

param.name: cores
param.doc: Default number of cores if -c=X is not given to mpcrun.

param.name: verbosity
param.doc: Default verbosity level from 0 to 3. Can be override by -vv on mpcrun.

param.name: banner
param.doc: Display the MPC banner at launch time to print some informations about the topology. Can be override by MPC_DISABLE_BANNER.

param.name: autokill
param.doc: Automatically kill the MPC processes after a given timeout. Use 0 to disable. Can be override by MPC_AUTO_KILL_TIMEOUT.

param.name: user_launchers
param.doc: Permit to extend the launchers available via 'mpcrun -l=...' by providing scripts (named mpcrun_XXXX) in a user directory. Can be override by MPC_USER_LAUNCHERS.

param.name: keep_rand_addr
param.doc: Activate randomization of base addresses

param.name: disable_rand_addr
param.doc: Deactivate randomization of base addresses

param.name: disable_mpc
param.doc: Do not use mpc for execution (deprecated?)

param.name: thread_init
param.doc: Initialize multithreading mode

param.name: nb_task
param.doc: Define the number of MPI tasks

param.name: nb_process
param.doc: Define the number of MPC processes

param.name: nb_processor
param.doc: Define the number of virtual processors

param.name: nb_node
param.doc: Define the number of compute nodes

param.name: launcher
param.doc: Define which launcher to use

param.name: max_try
param.doc: Define the max number of tries to access the topology file before failing

param.name: vers_details
param.doc: Print the MPC version number

param.name: profiling
param.doc: Select the type of outputs for the profiling

param.name: enable_smt
param.doc: Enable usage of hyperthreaded cores if available on current architecture.

param.name: share_node
param.doc: Enable the restriction on CPU number to share node

param.name: restart
param.doc: Restart MPC from a previous checkpoint

param.name: checkpoint
param.doc: Enable MPC checkpointing

param.name: migration
param.doc: Enable migration

param.name: report
param.doc: Enable reporting.

param.name: colors
param.doc: Print colored text in terminal
